title: Opinion: STAT+: I’m the former head of Pfizer R&D. I’m very worried about biopharma’s future
description: The New York Times once called John Lamattina, then Pfizer head of R&D, “Dr. Optimistic.” He’s not so optimistic now.
content: The New York Times once called John Lamattina, then Pfizer head of R&D, “Dr. Optimistic.” He’s not so optimistic now.
